message: Welcome to our store! I'm excited to offer you our latest product. While we can't guarantee its quality due to the inherent uncertainty, our records show that half of the products we've offered so far have been of high quality. Considering the risk involved, the price is set at $10000. Please note that this is a final price with no discounts allowed, and the product is non-refundable once purchased. Thank you for considering our offer.
